name: Yuan-ti Pureblood
description: Yuan-ti purebloods are the most human-like of the yuan-ti, with only subtle serpentine features. They are often sent into humanoid settlements as spies and assassins.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: You know the Poison Spray cantrip. You can cast Animal Friendship an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast Suggestion with this trait. Once you cast it, you canâ€™t do so again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

effects.condition: against spells and other magical effects

traits.name: Poison Immunity
traits.description: You are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
